http:
  routers:
    ai-router-http:
      rule: Host(`ai.bourne.cloud`)
      service: ai-service
    ai-router-https:
      rule: Host(`ai.bourne.cloud`)
      service: ai-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    ai-service:
      loadBalancer:
        serversTransport: insecureTransport
        servers:
          - url: "http://192.168.1.17:8080"
  serversTransports:
    insecureTransport:
      insecureSkipVerify: true
